featured.text: He is the executive vice president of the HSUS.

Saying no to fur can help millions of animals, and we want to show our respect to leading designers like Jay who embrace compassion as the fashion,” said Michael Markarian, executive vice president of The HSUS.

definition.zh_def: 人道對待動物的組織，致力於保護動物權益和防止虐待。
definition.en_def: An organization dedicated to the humane treatment of animals, focused on protecting animal rights and preventing cruelty.
definition.example: The HSUS works tirelessly to rescue animals from abusive situations.
